short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Scrape LinkedIn groups and extract their members with email to CSV / Excel.
short.de: LinkedIn-Gruppen durchsuchen und deren Mitglieder mit E-Mail in CSV/Excel extrahieren.
short.es,es_419: Extraiga grupos de LinkedIn y extraiga sus miembros con correo electr√≥nico en CSV/Excel.
short.fr: Extraire les groupes LinkedIn et extraire leurs membres avec l'e-mail au format CSV / Excel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate leads and followers on LinkedIn by exporting all the members of a LinkedIn group.

Help you export in a few minutes the latest 10,000 members of any LinkedIn group you have access to into a list of potential leads.

v2.0.0 Update
- Add enrich email with Email finder API, please contact us to add more providers.
- Most email finders need company name, please choose the extract user's company info option.

üî• FEATURES
‚úì Extract up to 10,000 group members
‚úì Extract user company, school, location and more profile
‚úì Filter by Owner / Manager / Members
‚úì Save and download member list in CSV/EXCEL/JSON format.
‚úì Continue free update

EXPORT COLUMNS
#Public Identifier, #Profile Link, #First Name, #Last Name, #Full Name, #Headline, #Picture URL, #Open To Work, #Degree, #Member Status, #Member Since, #Company Name, #Company Title, #School Name, #Degree Name, #Field Of Study, #Industry Name, #Summary, #Location Name, #Country Name, #Address, #Prefer Country Code, #Prefer Language Code, #Birth Date, #Is Student
